method.name: POST
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the users resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the new user. The name can contain any ASCII characters but leading and trailing white space will be trimmed.

param.name: password
param.doc: The password for the new user. This can contain any ASCII characters.

param.name: groups
param.doc: A list of groups the new user will belong to.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
